text: The "Sustainable Multidisciplinary Artificial Intelligence Research for Global Transformations - 2025" conference, themed "Accelerating SDGs through AI," aims to be a pivotal platform that will unite researchers and practitioners to explore how AI can drive the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. The conference's broad scope covers AI's role in material science for sustainable design, building structures and geology for resilient infrastructure, and optimizing mechanical and electrical systems for energy efficiency. It also delves into core AI/ML, automation, power systems, and communication systems advancements that improve resource conservation, disaster preparedness, and equitable development. By promoting interdisciplinary collaboration, the conference seeks to translate innovative AI research into tangible actions, addressing critical global challenges like climate change and resource scarcity, particularly relevant for emerging economies.
